html:
11.23.19  10:02 pm   Who's the biggest inspiration to you?

     it's not a contest. wait actually yes it is. but it's not over yet and everyone keeps surpassing each other

11.23.19  10:01 pm   best Halloween costume?

     the mush from inside a pumpkin

11.23.19  9:45 pm   Do you know how to make a game?

     no but i probably should

11.23.19  9:02 pm   Why me?

     because everyone

11.23.19  8:12 pm   Is 9.30.08  8:48pm (v) (impov section) your first video?

     probably an excerpt from it

11.23.19  8:01 pm   What is consciousness?

     i'll have to think about that

11.23.19  7:55 pm   i'm not 11.22.19  8:55 pm , but kind of in the same situation. i have lost my creativity and ability to talk to people throughout the last year. feeling like my life is falling apart. i try to find joy in socializing again, or at least some sort of escape from reality. i really want to make other people happy, inspire them somehow, though i can't even help myself at the moment. would you kindly suggest something?

     what always works for me in those situations is to start expressing myself in any way possible, whether it's written text, improvised music, or spoken words, even just discussing and anlyzing the situation. that's just because stirring up mental energy is the main way that i function and feel alive. it also gives me a lot of extra comfort to also know that i am documenting those expressions as a souvenir of the struggle. for me, that always works. i often recommend the same thing to other people, but actually i just realized that maybe not everyone else is exactly the same as me

11.23.19  7:34 pm   what do you think is the best way to make this world a better place?

     figure out how to be as human as we like to be without making so much trash

11.23.19  7:11 pm   Do houses really need walls?

     yes

11.23.19  6:19 pm   can you give me tips to pronounce circle in english. keeps sounding like sir kul

     that seems about right

11.23.19  6:14 pm   Was their anything else besides music that you wanted to make a living off?

     possibly video content as well

      And if so, do you still have an interest in it?

     yes

11.23.19  6:12 pm   With 50 years of hindsight now, did the impact The Beatles have on Western culture have a significant downside?

     john lennon was shot and killed by an obsessed fan

11.23.19  5:38 pm   11.23.19  11:12 am does this mean new bill wurtz content is still a long way off?

     i am urgently racing toward it as fast as i can. possibly even more urgently than you are waiting for it

11.23.19  5:29 pm   11.22.19  7:17 pm   whoa no way! i have always heard that one as a waltz... just blew my own mind by listening to it in 12/8 (which was mostly successful with a conscious effort, i am pleased to report)

i think because the vocals so strongly imply a slower 3, i would have needed a 12/8 groove for a few bars before the verse, otherwise the count-in just gets recontextualised in my brain as "interesting weird rhythm"

     yeah, yeah, that's exactly what i was afraid of

      having said that i just tested it on my sister and she got the 12/8 straight away so maybe my brain is just weird. this makes me want to do a survey

11.23.19  4:55 pm   When should I go onstage 

     as soon as you can locate the stage

11.23.19  4:09 pm   Why do you answer questions? I mean in this section. or generally idk, answer both pls.

     it drastically increases my powers

11.23.19  4:01 pm   What are you're thoughts on Wal-Mart?

     too small. smallmart, is what i'd call it

11.23.19  3:40 pm   11.22.19  12:27 pm My solutions to problems are always straight lines from problem to solution. However, sometimes certain parameters or obstacles mean that a straight line isn't viable. I can only see my straight line and seem to be blind to all the wiggly lines that appear plain to see for others. How do I see these other lines?

     if you give me some examples i can show you some simple approaches

11.23.19  3:29 pm   Peanut Butter or Jelly?? 

     there must be some way to combine them

11.23.19  3:14 pm   Can you regret something you've done unintentionally?

     yes

11.23.19  3:10 pm   what's the highest negative number

     almost zero

11.23.19  3:07 pm   Are you feeling random

     no

11.23.19  3:04 pm   How do we know you're the real bill and not an AI? 

     how do i know you're the real you, wait how do i even know who you're supposed to be?

11.23.19  2:18 pm   how do you make glowing neon text

     not the way i used to do it, that's for sure

11.23.19  1:57 pm   is your hobby actually public speaking omg that's kinda cool. what do you speak publically about?

     everything, i hope

11.23.19  1:43 pm   How do you write music

     you must let it write itself, although sometimes you can coax it by poking it with a small stick

      (how does the nonsensical rhyming happen)

     i don't know what that is

      and where the hell have you been?

     where have YOU been

11.23.19  1:31 pm   have you spotted some interesting stuff in miami beach?

     iguanas

11.23.19  1:09 pm   What made you do youtube

     pressure from society

11.23.19  1:01 pm   What's a good publicity stunt?

     fitting in to society

11.23.19  12:58 pm   Have you ever posted and then answered your own question 

     no

11.23.19  12:53 pm   do you like green eggs and ham?

     that depends what color the ham is

11.23.19  12:40 pm   do you think hermes is the best greek god? if yes, why? if no, who is best greek god/dess and why? 

     if one is the best then what the hell is the point of the other types

11.23.19  12:40 pm   I want to help make a significant positive difference in the world, but I feel so small in comparison to the world that it seems like nothing I could do would make much of an impact at all. Do you have any advice?

     keep learning about it. something will come to you

11.23.19  12:37 pm   What's the best type of cheese?

     if one is the best then what the hell is the point of the other types

11.23.19  12:37 pm   Do you realise how one in 7 billion you are? (I know everyone is technically but you know what I mean) 

     that may be what drives me to make such a public spectacle of myself

11.23.19  12:09 pm   what would you do if you had a house

     see if i could make it fly

11.23.19  12:08 pm   do you like your own videos

     i try to make them how i like them

11.23.19  11:50 am   what is the scariest thing you have encountered?

     goup

11.23.19  11:43 am   Do you feel like people somtimes look too much into your songs and their meaning?

     as long as they remember to also listen, and feel, then it should be fine

11.23.19  11:35 am   what's the highest number

     1

11.23.19  11:29 am   If you could la de da de da de da de day oh something, what would it be

     the WHOLE WORLD

11.23.19  11:27 am   What a hobby of yours outside of music/video production?

     public speaking

11.23.19  11:12 am   How is your new editing program

     not dealing with that yet, first i am dealing with tools to make the content that will be edited

11.23.19  10:01 am   what was your thought process behind the verse/chorus in just did a bad thing.

     there was not very much thought in the first 2 verses. i wrote them very fast, which was an advantage. it gave me courage to break the rules. the 'hey, what's the name of this game' came to me very easily. and i really liked it but i started to think it really didn't fit with that song. so i started trying other options, but eventually i realized that nothing was going to beat the legitimacy of the first choice

      also, what was your inspiration for the bass line in the alphabet shuffle 

     the groove just wasn't working right, and i found out the only way to fix it was to be extremely meticulous with the bass

11.23.19  9:55 am   11.22.19  12:09 pm

On mobile, iPhone 5s using Safari. Both versions (short and long) work perfectly for me.

     we've zeroed in on the trouble maker and it's CHROME. but that's ok. chrome users are welcome, it will be my responsibility to keep all pages less than 3000 lines

11.23.19  9:44 am   are you a dog person or a cat person OR a both person?

     human

11.23.19  8:35 am   what was your first question?

     what the heck

11.23.19  7:48 am   i keep having dreams that i'm at work. but i work a day job in rec and leisure so instead of dreamsongs i get like, dreamschedules and dream-staff performance evaluations. they are invariably useless in the real world due to the specific, reality-based nature of most schedules and performance evaluations. have you ever had a dreamsong that you immediately knew was completely unusable when you woke up?

     absolutely but sometimes i write it down anyway

11.23.19  7:12 am   who runs the town? 

     the mayor, or perhaps the hidden hand of darkness which the mayor answers to

11.23.19  6:05 am   what is things?

     scientists are trying to figure out
